name: J.A. Air Center
about: J.A. Air Center's flight school, located at Aurora Municipal Airport near Chicago, is a Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) certified institution offering comprehensive flight training programs. Established in 2008, the school has grown into one of the fastest-growing flight schools in the Chicago area, providing training up to the Airline Transport Pilot (ATP) rating. Utilizing the Cessna Pilot Center curriculum, JA Flight Training offers flexible web-based classes and hands-on instruction with a focus on safety and airmanship. The school boasts a modern fleet of Garmin G1000 aircraft and advanced simulators, and its unique affiliation with Southern Airways Express provides a fast-track path to airline careers. With a commitment to delivering top-notch aviation education, JA Flight Training is dedicated to helping students achieve their flying dreams.
